promo-messages.title: Bug Fix!! v. 1.1
promo-messages.description: There was an issue in some regions where the date was processed incorrectly! Click above for update.

streak-notes.1: Leggo, what matters the most is that you're drinking water!

streak-notes.4: On The Road to living a hydrated life.

streak-notes.6: Even When the Rain Stops, you don't stop... drinking water

streak-notes.7: Water is now officially your Best Friend
